PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		North West - Bolton
QUALIFICATIONS

CAREER SUMMARY
Nov 2021 to date JD Sports Fashion plc
Position: Engineering Support Operative
Proactively engaging asset care and Maintenance, Perform first response of material flow, operational and Engineering Issues.
Perform PPM Visual Inspection of the MHE in Accordance with the Engineering function CMMS and report failures to the Engineering Team.
Assist Engineering with fault rectification, maintenance and housekeeping activities.
Clearing Mechanical and Electrical Faults.
Climbing cranes to access cartons causing crane to enter error and crane rectification of issue.

PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		North West - Bolton
QUALIFICATIONS
B.Sc Mechanical Engineering (2014 - 2018) Mirpur University of Science and Technology, MUST AJK Pakistan
CAREER SUMMARY
Nov 2021 to date JD Sports Fashion plc
Position: Engineering Support Operative
Proactively engaging asset care and Maintenance, Perform first response of material flow, operational and Engineering Issues.
Perform PPM Visual Inspection of the MHE in Accordance with the Engineering function CMMS and report failures to the Engineering Team.
Assist Engineering with fault rectification, maintenance and housekeeping activities.
Clearing Mechanical and Electrical Faults.
Climbing cranes to access cartons causing crane to enter error and crane rectification of issue.
Undertake tasks associated with the climbing and rescuing at height.
Adhere to the application of safe working practice throughout day-to-day activities and in areas of high specialization.
Nov 2019 to Feb 2021 Trizac Contracting & General Maintenance
Position: Service Engineer
Supervising and coordinating with the engineering team and Technical Staff for the execution of maintenance activities and Regular PPM.
Supervising Mechanical Engineering Jobs (HVAC) based on shop drawings and Ensuring work is executed according to contract specifications, approved design drawings, agreed procedures, method statements and ensuring compliance with Health and Safety department.
Record, Coordinate, Follow up emergency Breakdown and ensuring the availability of adequate resources (manpower and material) for the execution of assigned job.
Responsible for troubleshooting and maintaining all kinds of Mechanical & Electrical equipment systems such as HVAC (Chillers, package AC units, Fresh Air Handling Units, Refrigerators), plumbing, electrical, low current systems, generator, and other MEP equipment.
COMMENT
Skills
Project Development
Departmental Leadership
Root Cause Analysis
Multi Project Management
Safety Compliance
Cost Effectiveness
Proactive Problem Solving
Quality Assurance

AUTO CAD
MS WORD
MS Excel
MS POWERPOINT
Achievement

Advertisement Manager (03/2016 - 03/2017) American Society of Mechanical Engineers (ASME), Chapter MUST
